casebody.data:
S.J.S., Petitioner/Respondent,
v.
C.M., Respondent/Appellant. No. ED 105568 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, Division Four. FILED: February 20, 2018 Steven A. Waterkotte, St. Loius, MO, for Appellant. S.J. S.-Pro Se, St. Louis, MO, for Respondent. Before Colleen Dolan, P.J., Mary K. Hoff, J., and Lisa S. Van Amburg, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

C.M. appeals from the judgment of the circuit court granting a Full Order of Protection against him in favor of S.J.S. We affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
